start.text: I'm starting a new painting, keep the bridge floor steady.
Be a dear and fetch my tablet, I need to draw this battle.
Aw their fleet formation is really pretty, gotta capture that.
Don't worry about me, just drawing their flagship.
Paint them with guns while I paint them on Canvas.

start_boss.text: God that's beautiful, I'm going to need pictures.
Wow look at the battle scars, does anyone have Vandyke Brown?
If you capture that after, can I draw you in front of it?

retreat.text: At least I got the guns.
I think I have an image of their captain's face, nice!

out_of_missiles.text: Err, engineering says we're out of missiles.
I think we ran out of missiles sometime back there, I was too busy drawing.

need_help.text: Gosh the floor is so shakey, are you doing okay over there second?
Aww, now I have to redo the turrets.
*Crash* Ow... Actually that looks pretty good.

pursuing.text: Lets chase them then, maybe I can draw their engines.
Get me closer I need to draw their bridge!
Erm, sure I guess. Go closer Second.

running.text: Sorry I'm packing up my painting supplies.
Gosh I think we need to go.
I think my oil is running.
The floor's too shakey to paint over here.

hull_90.text: Well it looks like i'll have to redraw that.

hull_50.text: Second in command here, captain is in a ball in the corner.
*A second, stronger voice breaks through the chaos.*
Does it always look like that Second?

hull_30.text: Please let us leave, this is no place for suicide.

overload.text: Gosh i'm going to be sick.
I think second has this under control, but please come soon.
This is nothing like the simulations, is engineering okay?

death.text: Hold on tight Second, i'll get us to the escape shuttle.

victory.text: Gosh I think I actually finished this time.
I think that was enough, I even got a good image of their captain.
Second do you want to catch a bite at that cafe on Umbra?
Me and Second are going on a date after, this stuff is too stressful for me.
Awh, don't make that face at me Second, you know we have to stay in fleet for the next few months.
